```{r load packages}
library(DSIWasteWater)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r create worksheet4}
#Should add more info about the data
data(wastewater_data, package = "DSIWasteWater")

workset4 <- buildWorkSheet4(wastewater_data)

#Only show Site with 150 measurements for vignette 
workset4 <- workset4%>% 
  filter(n >= 150)
```


```{r run package code}

reg_estimates <- buildRegressionEstimateTable(workset4)
head(reg_estimates)
```


```{r make DHS plot, fig.height=5,fig.width=78}
#comment explaining why we need two dataframes
#Pick better name for plot function
createDHSMethod_Plot(reg_estimates, workset4)

```
